snippet: Election year narratives are getting set for Congressional candidates. The next two weeks won't decide control of the House but they represent a new phase in the 2012 races as the campaigning gains intensity.
abstract: Election year narratives are getting set for Congressional candidates. The next two weeks won't decide control of the House but they represent a new phase in the 2012 races as the campaigning gains intensity.

headline.main: On Recess, Congressional Leaders Shift Focus to Election
